channel.title: Item recoloring help
channel.description:
Idk if this is in the right forum or not...if its not plz lock it
I was looking thru the item recoloring thread and i seen the codes so i pasted them into my class8 and they didnt work. So can i just post them anywhere or must i post them in a specific place? Help appreciated

item.title: Item recoloring help
item.dc:creator: @jakeyboy302 jakeyboy302
item.description:
@jakeyboy302 wrote:

i dont know where to get the original color codes at i got these off the item reclouring thread

Read full topic

item.title: Item recoloring help
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Did he include the original colors? Cocoa I’ll help if you need it, I’m a pro at clients :o

Read full topic

item.title: Item recoloring help
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Oh and the shit you leeched might have a different cache than your client, So it might not work.

Read full topic

you can’t be stupid and do that. Well yes you can. But apparently you’re extremely stupid. Show me the code and I’ll fix it up for you
